knimeNode.name: Inductive Miner (DFG Table)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node mines a Petri Net from directly-follows model (DFG Table) with implicit Inductive Miner.

fullDescription.intro: Inductive Miner (DFG Table) discovers a process model in the form of a Petri Net.
fullDescription.option: Noise threshold is used to set the fitting trace percent with respect to the new model. 0.8 is as the default value.

ports.outPort: The discovered process model in process tree.
